column3: Latest; Phnom Penh: At 2:35 am on January 20
column4: a fight broke out between two workers at Diamond Palace KTV
column7: Phnom Penh. ------Three girls who got into an argument over who called who what
column8: slaps were thrown and one of the girls took a pair of small scissors from her bag and slashed the 22 year old victims arm and face.------Police from Khan Toul Kork turned up and started questioning the girls and the manager.------The suspect was then taken away to Toul Kork police station for a case to be prepared.------ ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/406574
